definition: Pingliang prefecture level city in Gansu
surname Ping
flat/level/equal/to tie (make the same score)/to draw (score)/calm/peaceful/see also 平聲|平声[ping2 sheng1]
cool/cold

the five Liang of the Sixteen Kingdoms, namely: Former Liang 前涼|前凉 (314-376), Later Liang 後涼|后凉 (386-403), Northern Liang 北涼|北凉 (398-439), Southern Liang 南涼|南凉 (397-414), Western Liang 西涼|西凉 (400-421)
to let sth cool down

sentences.english: Can be circled and the wooden ladder to the top, look around Pingliang city scenery.
sentences.chinese: 可以木梯盘旋而上至顶层，举目四望平凉城市风光。

sentences.english: The Pingliang South Station is located at the Bao-Zhong Line being constructed, and has a big traffic volume.
sentences.chinese: 平凉南站位于正在建设中的宝中线上，作业量较大。

sentences.english: September 2002, removed to build the city of Pingliang.
sentences.chinese: 二零零二年九月，平凉撤地建市。

sentences.english: Since then, the city's jurisdiction throughout Pingliang not much change again.
sentences.chinese: 自此，平凉市的辖境再未有大的变动。

sentences.english: Pingliang revoked in January 1964, the restoration of Pingliang County.
sentences.chinese: 一九六四年元月撤销平凉市，恢复平凉县。

sentences.english: Pingliang revoked in January 1964, the restoration of Pingliang County.
